title: John Sharian
text:
John Sharian (born John Shahnazarian) is an actor. He appeared in the film "<a href="The%20Machinist">The Machinist</a>" (2004).
Education.
John Sharian attended the <a href="Taft%20School">Taft School</a> in <a href="Watertown%2C%20Connecticut">Watertown, Connecticut</a> and later the <a href="Kenyon%20College">Kenyon College</a> in <a href="Gambier%2C%20Ohio">Gambier, Ohio</a>, which he left in 1984.
Career.
Sharian graduated from the <a href="Bristol%20Old%20Vic%20Theatre%20School">Bristol Old Vic Theatre School</a> in 1991 and began television acting shortly thereafter, appearing in the British sci-fi comedy series "<a href="Red%20Dwarf">Red Dwarf</a>" in 1992.
Sharian's film career began in 1994 with his role as one of the leads in "<a href="Death%20Machine">Death Machine</a>". He also appeared in "<a href="The%20Machinist">The Machinist</a>" (2004).
